control.name: distanceChanger1
control.description: If enabled, specifies the distance between groups provided that any of the explorer views is applied.

control.name: distanceChanger2
control.description: If enabled, specifies the horizontal indent between groups and navbar's right and left edges provided that any of the explorer views is applied.

control.name: distanceChanger3
control.description: If enabled, specifies the distance between links in a group.
